meanings.definition: Extremely dense or compact in structure.
meanings.sent1: The ultradense rock sank quickly in the water.
meanings.sent2: The black hole is known for its ultradense core.
meanings.sent3: The ultradense cake was so heavy, it almost broke the plate!
meanings.sent4: Her ultradense knowledge of the subject impressed everyone in the room.
meanings.sent5: The ultradense fog made it impossible to see more than a few feet ahead.

meanings.definition: Having a high concentration of mass or matter in a small space.
meanings.sent1: The ultradense star collapsed under its own gravity.
meanings.sent2: The ultradense neutron star is one of the densest objects in the universe.
meanings.sent3: The ultradense crowd at the concert made it hard to move.
meanings.sent4: His ultradense argument left everyone in the room speechless.
meanings.sent5: The ultradense forest was filled with ancient, towering trees.
